name: Thunderstorm Flanger
details:
Vintage-Style Flanger Pedal with All-Analog Bucket-Brigade CircuitTHUNDERSTORM FLANGER perfectly captures the classic analog flanger tones of yesteryear from subtle, tape-like sweeps and lush chorusing – to a no-holds barred flanger frenzy! Designed by guitarists around an all-analog, Bucket-Brigade Device (BBD), THUNDERSTORM FLANGER delivers the goods in an extremely affordable package – one that will elevate both your mood, and your music.
https://www.tcelectronic.com/product.html?modelCode=P0CB0
